National Department of Health Leads
Dr M Makua; Ms J Mahuntsi; Ms E Mokaba 
The National Department of Health, Women’s Maternal and Reproductive Health Chief Directorate 
(WMRH) and Maternal & Neonatal Health Directorate with support of the World Health Organization 
(WHO) and United Nations Children’s Fund (UNICEF) country offices representatives, gratefully 
acknowledge the contributions that many individuals and organizations have made to the development 
of these guidelines.
